description: Primes p such that p+1 is LCM[1,...,m] for some (usually more than one) m.
comments: A051451(n)-1, when prime.Primes p = LCM(1,...,m) - 1, where m is a prime power. (The prime powers give all values, and do so uniquely.) - _Daniel Forgues_, Apr 28 2014
prog: (PARI) L=1; for(n=2,1e3,if(isprimepower(n,&p) && ispseudoprime((L*=p)-1), print1(L-1", "))) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Apr 28 2014
author: _Labos Elemer_, Nov 08 2000
